title: ðŸ“œ Maloba ya Misala
intro: Boyei na Excell-is-Hub App, plateforme na bino ya koyekola na internet. Soki ozwaki compte to osalaki misala na biso, ozali kondima makambo oyo elandi. Tala yango malamu.

access.title: ðŸŽ“ Kokota na ba cours
access.content: Mpo na kozwa cours, esengeli kosala compte ya moto. Ba contenu mosusu ezali na libela, mosusu ezali ya kofutela. Soki olandi te, compte ekoki kosila.

intellectual.title: ðŸ“˜ Bokonzi ya makanisi
intellectual.content: Ba cours nyonso, ba vidÃ©os, ba PDF mpe biloko nyonso ya koyekola ezali ya platforme to ya ba auteurs. Kokopier, koteka to kosakola yango ezali na ndingisa te.

behavior.title: ðŸ‘¤ Bizaleli ya mosaleli
behavior.content: Mosaleli asengeli kozala na esengo mpe bosolo na forum, commentaire, mpe ba live. Kosala mabe ekoki kobimisa yo na plateforme.

modifications.title: ðŸ”„ Mbongwana
modifications.content: Makambo oyo ekoki kobongwana na ntango nyonso. Tokoyebisa bino na email to na alerte na plateforme.

footer.text: Soki ozali na motuna mpo na makambo oyo, tika message na peji ya contact.
